title: Ligatures with @font-face?
content:
I cant find decent info on this anywhere, does anyone know if possible to use alternative ligatures on the web using the @font-face css technique?

Thanks for you help  
george

(yes Im using this technique legally)
author: George Coltart

comments.content:
At the moment only in Firefox.  
 [http://opentype.info/wiki/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=7&p=37#p37](http://web.archive.org/web/20120308180548/http:/opentype.info/wiki/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=7&p=37#p37 "http://opentype.info/wiki/forum/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=7&p=37#p37")
